Cape Wind deal to add slightly to NStar bills

NStar agreed to pay a starting price for power from the Cape Wind project that is substantially above the cost of conventional energy. (Boston Globe)

The numbers for what could be the single biggest lottery payout ever are 2, 4, 23, 38, 46, Mega Ball 23. (AP)

Cash mobs help local businesses

In eight hours, The Cannoli Guy Café in Malden rang in a week’s worth of sales thanks to buy-local efforts combined with the power of a flash mob. (Boston Globe)

Bridging two worlds

Madeleine Lippey, a Phillips Academy sophomore, founded a nonprofit, online literary magazine The Do Write Campaign to connect young people around the world. (Boston Globe)
  • Poem submission from The Do Write Campaign

Lack of rain raises drought fears

At a time when rivers and streams throughout the region usually crest and the soil is often saturated, much of the state is bone-dry and many rivers are at record lows. (Boston Globe)
